title: zakservers
author: zakservers
content: We are pleased to announce our new line of powerful 10Gbps unmetered servers in Netherlands DC3, these offshore servers are perfect for high end streaming website projects and any other e-commerce project, these are also offshore dedicated servers, means you get full privacy with them, and can host almost any type of content with security and performance.These servers come with default 128GB RAM though you can upgrade it to 1.5TB too. One configuration is as follows.10Gbps S-1Dual Intel Xeon Gold 6226R128GB1TB SSD10GbpsUnmetered1 IPv4Linux or Windows OSPrice: $1799/monthThis server has a fully dedicated 10gbps uplink to it, not shared, and you can use it to full (Full Duplex port).Order and view other available configurations kindly visit: https://www.zakservers.com/offshore-dedicated-servers.phpWe do accept BTC, Monero XMR, Bank Transfer and other crypto currencies too.No verification is needed, and you can pay anonymously.24/7/365 customer support is also available via tickets, live chat and phone.
